definitions.definition: a substance that causes death or harm if it gets into the body

examples.text: Some mushrooms contain a deadly poison.
How did he die? Was it poison?
The dog was killed by rat poison *(= poison intended to kill ).
She had laced his drink with poison.

definitions.definition: an idea, a feeling, etc. that is extremely harmful

examples.text: These words were pure poison to me.
groups that are spreading the poison of sectarianism

definitions.definition: used to say that different people like different things; what one person likes very much, another person does not like at all
used to ask somebody what alcoholic drink they would like

wordOrigin: Middle English (denoting a harmful medicinal draught): from Old French poison ‘magic potion’, from Latin potio(n-) ‘potion’, related to potare ‘to drink’.
